title: Technology Integration Education Based on Connected Learning for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in operating secondary education curricula and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing collaboration among learners and practical technology integration in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can complete the design of a digital storytelling lesson suitable for language instruction by applying the Connected Learning Framework.
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of technology-integrated instructional materials and propose improvements using a peer feedback system.
Participants can develop instructional strategies that promote student-led creative activities using smartphone-based tools, even in environments with limited technology.

resources: Smartphone-Compatible Authoring Tools (e.g., Adobe Spark, Canva)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
